articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), on Friday. 
					 Xi Jinping in his message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the C.C., the WPK and all its members and the Korean people on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK on behalf of the C.C., the CPC and on his own behalf. 
					
					 Under the leadership of the great leader of the Korean people President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il the WPK led the Korean people to tide over the manifold hardships and achieve independence of the country and liberation of its people and attained noteworthy successes in the socialist revolution and construction of Korea, the message said. 
					
					 In recent years First Secretary Kim Jong Un has led the WPK and the Korean people and made positive advance in different fields including economic development and improvement of the people's living standard true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, it said. 
					
					 It sincerely wished the Korean people steady, fresh and bigger successes in the construction of Korean-style socialism under the guidance of the WPK headed by First Secretary Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Noting that the China-DPRK friendship has a glorious tradition, the message expressed the willingness to successfully defend, solidify and develop the Sino-DPRK friendship together with comrades of the DPRK to bring happiness to the two countries and two peoples and to play active and constructive role to protect peace and stability of the region and the world. 
					
					 It sincerely wished the WPK steady development, the DPRK prosperity and the Sino-DPRK friendship ever-lasting down through generations.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK and CPC Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK and CPC Held
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Communist Party of China (CPC) were held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Present at the talks from the WPK's side were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and other officials of the Party Central Committee and from the CPC's side were members of the CPC delegation headed by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, and Li Chenqun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 At the talks both sides exchanged views on the issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Reception Given for CPC Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for CPC Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) gave a reception at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday in honor of a delegation of the Communist Party of China (CPC) on an official goodwill visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation headed by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the CPC, and Li Chenqun, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Ri Chang Gun, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae noted in his speech that the Korean people are grandly celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK as an auspicious and revolutionary holiday with great pride and joy.
					
					 During its stay the delegation will witness the spirit and stirring reality of the DPRK where the service personnel and people are dynamically advancing with confidence in victory and optimism, single-mindedly united around the great Party, he added.
					
					 Liu Yunshan in his speech said the WPK made world-startling successes in the socialist revolution and construction by dint of the single-minded unity under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Noting the WPK with a glorious history and tradition is the center of leadership over the Korean revolution and construction, he sincerely hoped that the Korean people would register successes in building Korean-style socialism under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., CPV
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., CPV
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, on Oct. 6.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend the warmest congratulation to you and the Korean people on behalf of the C.C., CPV on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 The DPRK and the Korean people have registered great successes under the leadership of the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung and strengthened by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and First Secretary Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The CPV and the Vietnamese people sincerely wish the WPK and Korean people bigger successes in building peaceful and prosperous socialist Korea and accomplishing the cause of defence.
					
					 I wish that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and two peoples developed by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and leaders of several generations will be steadily strengthened in the interests of the two peoples and make a contribution to peace, cooperation and development in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 I wish you good health and greater fresh success in your noble and responsible work.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK, CPV
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK, CPV
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Talks between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Communist Party of Vietnam (CPV) took place in Pyongyang on Friday.
					 Present there from the WPK's side were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK and other officials of the Party Central Committee and from the opposite side were members of a delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam led by Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of the CPV Central Committee and director of its Mass Movement Department, and Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Discussed at the talks were the issue of boosting the relations between the two parties and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Meanwhile, an agreement on cooperation between the International Affairs Department of the C.C., the WPK and the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the Communist Party of Vietnam was signed on the same day.

articles.title: Talks between Vice-President of DPRK SPA Presidium, Vice-President of Council of State of Cuba Held
articles.content:
Talks between Vice-President of DPRK SPA Presidium, Vice-President of Council of State of Cuba Held
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Talks between Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, and Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 Present there from the DPRK's side were Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and from the opposite side were members of the party and government delegation of the Republic of Cuba.
					
					 Discussed at the talks discussed the issue of further developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Reception Given for Cuban Party and Government Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for Cuban Party and Government Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Friday hosted a reception in honor of a party and government delegation of the Republic of Cuba on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the delegation led by Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, and officials of the Cuban embassy here.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in a speech said that the party and people of Cuba have made great progress in the struggle for defending the gains of revolution and building prosperous socialism under the leadership of respected Comrade Raul Castro Ruz.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever struggle together with the Cuban people on the road for independence against imperialism and for socialism, true to the noble intention of the great leaders and Marshal Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa in his speech said: The friendly relations between Cuba and the DPRK developed by the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are growing stronger thanks to respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He sincerely hoped on behalf of the party, government and people of Cuba that the Korean people would register successes in the struggle for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Reception Given for Delegation of Lao People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Reception Given for Delegation of Lao People's Revolutionary Party
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) Friday hosted a reception in honor of a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party (LPRP) on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were members of the LPRP delegation headed by Chansy Phosikham, secretary of its Central Committee and chairman of its Organization Committee, and Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., WPK, and other officials of the party Central Committee.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech said the DPRK is rejoiced as over its own over many successes made by the party and people of Laos in their struggle to consolidate and develop the people's democratic system and strengthen the overall national power under the leadership of General Secretary Choummaly Saynasone.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the DPRK to invariably develop the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations which were provided by the preceding leaders and to which the top leaders of the two countries pay attention, he said, adding the DPRK will advance shoulder to shoulder with the Lao comrades in the drive for carrying out the joint cause for socialism. 
					
					 Chansy Phosikham wholeheartedly congratulated on behalf of the party, government and all the people of Laos the Korean people on their achievements made in building a thriving nation for the past 70 years under the leadership of the eternal leaders of the Korean people Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and of the WPK headed by Marshal Kim Jong Un, successor to their great revolutionary cause.
					
					 He extended sincere and deep thanks to the fraternal party, government and people of the DPRK for sending invariable support to the Lao people in their struggle for accomplishing the cause of national liberation and building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Korean people would successfully advance, registering bigger successes in building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from Sudanese Party Leader
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from Sudanese Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Omar Hassan Ahmad Al-Bashir, chairman of the Sudanese National Congress, on September 15. 
					 The chairman in the message said that he was pleased to extend congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the friendly people of the DPRK on the occasion of October 10, 2015, the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 It expressed the will to continue to make joint efforts to boost the good relations between the two friendly parties and peoples.

articles.title: DPRK Government Hosts Reception for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations
articles.content:
DPRK Government Hosts Reception for Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government gave a reception in honor of the delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel Friday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there on invitation were the delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea from various countries and regions.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the WPK Central Committee, Chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, and officials concerned were on hand.

articles.title: Secretaries of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Delegates in Celebrations for Party Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Secretaries of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Delegates in Celebrations for Party Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Secretaries of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) visited the lodging quarters of the delegates to the celebrations for the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK on Friday.
					 They warmly congratulated the delegates on their participation in the celebrations.
					
					 They encouraged the delegates, hearing their miracles and innovations exciting the era in the production and construction by kindling the torch of creating the new Korean speed.
					
					 They requested the delegates to discharge their duty as core and vanguard fighters of the WPK in the ongoing general offensive for a final victory, always bearing in mind the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un believing in the people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Delegation of Communist Party of China Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Communist Party of China Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, arrived here on Friday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegation of CVP Here
articles.content:
Delegation of CVP Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam headed by Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of its Central Committee and director of its Mass Movement Department, arrived here Friday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Cuban Party and Government Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Cuban Party and Government Delegation Arrives 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A party and government delegation of the Republic of Cuba led by Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and vice-president of the Council of State of Cuba, arrived here on Friday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Delegation of Lao People's Revolutionary Party Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Lao People's Revolutionary Party Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party headed by Chansy Phosikham, secretary of its Central Committee and chairman of its Organization Committee, arrived here on Friday to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Family Members of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
articles.content:
Family Members of Chinese Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Family members of Chai Shiying and Wang Xiaoming, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, arrived here Friday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Russia Arrives Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Russia Arrives Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the United Confederation of Koreans in Maritime Territory of Russia led by Chairman Pak Phyong Won arrived here on Friday to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea arrived here on Friday to participate in celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a Russian delegation of organizations for the study of the Juche idea headed by Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, a Moldovan delegation of organizations for the study of the Juche idea headed by Aleksei Bolynets, a delegation of the Pakistan Association for Self－Reliance Studies  headed by its Chairman Javed Ansari, Vladimir Mychko, a delegate of the February 16 Society for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics of Belarus, and  D. Oyuntungalag, a Mongolian delegate of organizations for the study of the Juche idea.

articles.title: Artyom City Delegation of Russia Here
articles.content:
Artyom City Delegation of Russia Here
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Artyom City, Maritime Territory of Russia headed by Mayor Vladimir Novikov arrived here Friday to take part in the celebrations for the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Bodies
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Bodies
Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by foreign bodies. 
					 They were from the Slovenia-Korea Friendship Association, the France-Korea Friendship Association, the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture and the Ireland-Korea Friendship Association on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. Among them were also the one in the joint name of the Milano Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and the one in the joint name of the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions and the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 They were separately handed to an official concerned.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from a Russian delegation of organizations for the study of the Juche idea, the director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics and the mayor of Artyom City of Russia. They are on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gifts were handed to officials concerned.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Institute
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Institute
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Oct. 9 by Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea who is leading a Russian delegation of organizations for the study of the Juche idea, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Senior officials of the party, the state and the army including Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Phyong So and Pak Pong Ju and delegates for celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday. 
					 They laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The floral basket and letter were handed to Choe Thaek Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps, and German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Presidents of Palestine, Nigeria
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Kim Jong Un from Presidents of Palestine, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, and Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the armed forces of the Federal Republic of Nigeria, on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The floral baskets were separately handed to Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, and Osunmakinde Edward Dolapo, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian embassy here, on Thursday.
					
					 That day Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge and Mienze Kiaku, honorary deputy general secretary of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Foreign Political Parties, Organizations
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Foreign Political Parties, Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign political parties and organizations sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the Socialist Party of Romania, Hungarian Workers' Party, New Communist Party of Britain, National Executive Committee of the African National Congress of South Africa, Central Committee of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party of Namibia, National Executive Committee of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and the Democracy of DR Congo and the general secretary of the Patriotic Front of Zambia.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK sent a floral basket to the statutes in their joint name.
					
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Family of Zhang Weihua
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket from the family of Zhang Weihua, Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned by Zhang Qi, grandson of Zhang Weihua, on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party and the Federation for Mali sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Delegation of Lao People's Revolutionary Party
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il by Delegation of Lao People's Revolutionary Party
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party Friday laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Choummaly Sayasone
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Choummaly Sayasone
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Choummaly Sayasone, president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The floral basket was handed to Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese embassy here sent floral baskets to the Central Committee of the WPK on the occasion of its 70th birthday.

articles.title: Family Members of Persons Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Abroad Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Family Members of Persons Related to Anti-Japanese Revolutionary Struggle Abroad Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Family members of persons related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle abroad visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They looked round historic relics, looking back upon the revolutionary life of the President and his family members who devoted their all to the country's liberation and the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 They also toured the Monument to Party Founding, Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage, etc.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Hall
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Hall
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Friday visited the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Hall on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Members of the corps went round the exhibition hall presenting spectacular scenery with immortal flowers. 
					
					 Le Duy Long, military attache of the Vietnamese embassy, wrote in the visitor's book that Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in full bloom represent ardent yearning of the Korean people and service personnel for the great leaders. He wished them bigger successes in the building of a thriving country under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Ensemble Visits Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Russian Ensemble Visits Jonsung Revolutionary Museum 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior led by Chief Victor Yeliseev Friday visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum. The delegation is on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 The guests paid tribute to the mosaic depicting the image of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 They looked round the historical materials and relics on display, being briefed on the fact that the President defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and created military miracles specially recorded in the modern history of wars.

articles.title: Russian Ensemble Visits Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Russian Ensemble Visits Liberation Tower 
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Academy Ensemble of the Interior Unit of the Russian Ministry of Interior Friday visited the Liberation Tower to lay a wreath. The delegation is on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Present there were officials concerned and the Russian ambassador to the DPRK and his embassy officials. 
					
					 After laying a wreath before the tower in the name of the Russian ensemble, the participants paid silent tribute to the fighters of the Soviet Army who fell in the battles for the liberation of Korea. 
					
					 They went round the tower.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark WPK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here Friday to mark the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters Hwang Sun Hui, Kim Chol Man, Kim Ok Sun, Pak Kyong Suk and Ri Yong Suk, delegates to the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, officials of the party and armed forces organ, Cabinet and working people's organizations, youth and students in Pyongyang, overseas compatriots congratulatory groups and delegations including the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegations of various countries on a visit the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international bodies, military attaches of foreign embassies here and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report.
					
					 The WPK is a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il which has created a new history of building a revolutionary party having the great leaders at its head for 70 years, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 The guiding ideology of the WPK and its historic roots, its foundation and development were ascribable to the great leaders and the party's absolute authority and might are associated with their sacred august names.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea in the early period of the Korean revolution, laid down the original policy for founding the party, provided a firm organizational and ideological foundation for party building and established shining revolutionary traditions in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle and proclaimed the founding of the party before the whole world on their basis on October 10, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 The President's founding of the party made it possible for the Korean people to confidently advance along the road of creating a new society and a new life with their reliable vanguard and political staff and usher in  a new era of building a revolutionary party advancing under the banner of independence in the human history of politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward and developed the President's idea and the cause of party-building by leading the party and revolution for half a century.
					
					 Thanks to the original idea and theory of Kim Jong Il and his wise leadership a radical change took place in all fields of the party building and activities, the WPK remarkably grew stronger to be a party of Kim Il Sung both in name and in reality and the might of the WPK as an ever-victorious guide of carrying out the cause of Juche revolution and the cause of Songun revolution dramatically increased.
					
					 The WPK has grown strong under the guidance of the leaders, having the outstanding leaders at the top post generation after generation.
					
					 Unprecedented in the history was the great and glorious party shining with the august names of the great leaders who founded the party and developed it.
					
					 As the WPK has become an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions in which all its members single-mindedly share breath with the leader and act as one, no matter how frequently the generation of the revolution is replaced by a new one and no matter how the circumstances of the times may change, our party could cover a glorious road thanks to dynamic advance and steady succession without knowing any twist and turn.
					
					 The new century of the Juche revolution rushing forward to the world in the spirit of At a Go sailing with the blizzards of Paektu is a victorious one in which the greatness and leadership ability of the  WPK will be demonstrated at the best level and cheers for the WPK heard from all parts of the country.
					
					 The ever-victorious history of the WPK, the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, will last forever with the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu at the helm generation after generation. This is the immovable truth of the service personnel and people of the DPRK, looking back on the glorious 70-year history of the WPK and foreseeing the rosy future to last for 700, 7 000 years to come.
					
					 The reporter underscored the need to boost the fighting capability of the party and more dynamically accelerate the general march for hastening a final victory as required by the era of great change and new era of the Juche revolution.

articles.title: DPRK Order and Medal Awarded to Adherents to Juche Idea
articles.content:
DPRK Order and Medal Awarded to Adherents to Juche Idea
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Adherents to the Juche idea were awarded the DPRK order and medal.
					 An awarding ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					
					 Order of DPRK Friendship 2nd Class went to Henry Masiko, director general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Andre Lohekele Kalonda, its secretary general, Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, and Keizo Sumiya, co-representative of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and the Friendship Medal to two adherents to the Juche idea in recognition for their contribution to the cause of human independence through brisk study and dissemination of the immortal Juche idea.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Tong Thae Gwan
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Awarded to Tong Thae Gwan
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK decided to award Order of Kim Jong Il to Tong Thae Gwan, a member of the editorial board of Rodong Sinmun. He successfully created political essay "Our Great People" and other articles pervaded with the spirit of the glorious era of Kim Jong Un by firmly equipping himself with the Juche idea and the Songun idea of the party and displaying fervent creative enthusiasm and thus made a distinguished contribution to demonstrating the might of the harmonious whole of the party and the popular masses before the whole world and powerfully arousing all the service personnel and people to the drive for implementing the party's idea and uphold party's policies.
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on Oct. 8.

articles.title: AP Photo Exhibit for Marking WPK Anniversary Opens
articles.content:
AP Photo Exhibit for Marking WPK Anniversary Opens
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibit for marking the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition Friday.
					 On show are photos of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un warmly waving back to ranks of a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary army firmly upholding the Songun cause of the party from the tribune of honor of military parades.
					
					 Also on display are photos dealing with the reality of the DPRK and showing the Korean people leading a happy life under the socialist system.
					
					 Present there were Deputy Director General of the Korean Central News Agency Rim Ho Ryong, officials concerned, Senior Vice President and Executive Editor of the Associated Press Kathleen Carroll, Vice President Santiago Rigney Lyon and other executives concerned of the AP, Stiernlof Bo Torkel, Swedish ambassador to the DPRK and other foreign guests. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The attendants went round the photos on display.

articles.title: 1st Enlarged Meeting of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Held
articles.content:
1st Enlarged Meeting of Council of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Held
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The first enlarged meeting of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation took place here on Thursday.
					 Present there were Chairman Kim Chang Ryong, Co-Chairman Johnny Hon and Vice-Chairman Keith Bennett of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and other members of the council.
					
					 It was attended by delegates of the organizations for the study of the Juche idea of different countries and regions as observers.
					
					 It stressed the need for the foundation to establish a well-regulated international system and realize the exchange, friendship and cooperation among famous foundations in the world.
					
					 It set forth the direction of work to develop the foundation going by the august name of the peerlessly great men into the dignified and prestigious foundation in the world. 
					
					 It elected members of the council.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Commemorative Stamp Issued to Mark WPK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Commemorative Stamp Issued to Mark WPK's Founding Anniversary
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Commemorative stamps (a sheet, sheetlet and individual stamp) were issued by the State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Inscribed on the sheet and sheetlet are the emblem of the WPK and letters "Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of WPK" and "Juche 34 (1945)-Juche 104(2015)".
					
					 Depicted on the sheet are Korean paining "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Watching the Party Flag" and Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Seen on the sheetlet are images of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. Printed there are  song "Long Live the WPK" and Korean paintings "Working together for People", "The Great Leader Who Made a Lot of Efforts to Perfect Juche Iron" and "Our Supreme Commander Who Visited Post on Islet despite Rough Sea" and oil painting "Morning in June".
					
					 Depicted on the individual stamp are worker, farmer and intellectual dynamically advancing along the road of Juche under the leadership of the party, tightly holding a hammer, a sickle and a writing brush each against background of the azure sky in jubilant October.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet at Nampho Port
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet at Nampho Port
 Nampho, October 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Nampho Port Friday on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Earlier, they watched photos dealing with feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The captain and crewmen of a Panama-flagged ship made speeches at the meeting.
					
					 Speakers said that the WPK is an invincible party that shines with the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would achieve greater success in their efforts to defend the country's dignity and sovereignty and build a thriving socialist nation under the wise leadership of the WPK while holding Marshal Kim Jong Un at the top post.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: DPRK Acrobats Win Top Prize at Wuqiao Int'l Acrobatic Festival
articles.content:
DPRK Acrobats Win Top Prize at Wuqiao Int'l Acrobatic Festival
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK acrobats proved successful at the 15th Wuqiao International Acrobatic Festival.
					 The festival held in Hebei Province of China between September 29 and October 4 brought together acrobats from 20 countries and regions including the DPRK, Russia, Ukraine, France, Germany, Argentina and Mexico.
					
					 The DPRK aerial stunts "With Wings of Leap" won Gold Lion Prize, the top prize of the festival.

articles.title: Rosy Future in Store for Korean People
articles.content:
Rosy Future in Store for Korean People
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea are now demonstrating its dignity all over the world under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Such proud reality would have been unthinkable without outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un formulated Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the guiding ideology of the DPRK, as the one based on the people-first doctrine and is creditably carrying forward the idea of believing in people as in Heaven, which had been treasured up by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetime.
					
					 Under the slogan "Everything for the people and everything by relying on them!" the WPK has made all its efforts to materialize the dream of the people.
					
					 It can be clearly evidenced by the fact that many edifices, including the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Masikryong Ski Resort and Mirim Riding Club, have made their appearances throughout the country while signal successes have been achieved in the struggle to build a highly civilized socialist nation with economic power.
					
					 The advantages of socialism which capitalism can neither possess nor imitate have been fully displayed in all aspects of people's living.
					
					 Only rosy future is in store for the Korean people advancing along road of prosperity indicated by Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly great man.

articles.title: People in DPRK Grateful to WPK Headed by Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
People in DPRK Grateful to WPK Headed by Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The people in the DPRK are now very grateful to the Workers' Party of Korea headed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un which has shown loving care for their life.
					 On the threshold of the 70th WPK birthday, Kim Jong Un visited the flood-hit Paekhak-dong in Sonbong area of Rason City, which has been rebuilt into a fairy village.
					
					 When the Sonbong area in northern part of the country was flooded one month ago, the supreme leader took an immediate step to rehabilitate the area, dispatching servicepersons and personally visited the area under reconstruction.
					
					 He also saw to it that TVs, hard glassware, foodstuffs, wadded clothes and even matches and toilet paper were supplied to the flood victims who would soon move into newly-built dwelling houses.
					
					 That is why the inhabitants in the flood-hit area of Rason City have expressed heartfelt thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, shouting "Long live the Workers' Party of Korea" and hardening their will to work harder for the party and the country.
					
					 Such scenes and shout can be witnessed in every corner of the country led by Kim Jong Un who attaches top priority to the promotion of popular masses' wellbeing.

articles.title: KCNA Report on Achievements Made in Building Thriving Nation on Occasion of 70th Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
KCNA Report on Achievements Made in Building Thriving Nation on Occasion of 70th Anniversary of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a report Thursday on the achievements made in building a thriving nation on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 This year's general offensive has been an all-people advance that has dashed forward, mercilessly meeting all sorts of challenges of the hostile forces in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and demonstrating the invincibility of the great Paektusan nation and the high spirit of youth power, the report said, and went on:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un's historic New Year Address which called for turning out in the general offensive for bringing earlier the final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu greatly encouraged all the Koreans.
					
					 In hearty response to the patriotic call made by the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu, all the party members, service personnel and other people began their gigantic advance toward the grand October festival.
					
					 The Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station imposingly appeared in the  Paektu area as a grand monument built by the youth, pride of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Wonsan Baby Home and Orphanage, Pyongyang Home for the Aged and other monumental structures were completed in a short span of time.
					
					 The Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm turned into a modern farm in less than a year and Rason that had been hit hard by unprecedented flood turned into a socialist fairyland in a matter of over 30 days.
					
					 Scientists of the Pyongyang Bio-technical Institute produced Korean-style biological agro-chemicals and laid a foundation for the industrialization of their production, thus pushing back the frontiers of science in the research and application of biological technology.
					
					 High-yielding seeds of corn, rice, bean, barley and sweet potato and vegetables were cultivated and methods of drastically increasing their production were established in the agricultural field, making an active contribution to increasing agricultural production.
					
					 Teachers and researchers across the country made unprecedented scientific and research achievements, propelling the development of science and technology and the building of an economic power.
					
					 A big innovation has been made in implementing the party's policy on settling the food issue for the people and drastically improving their living standard with agriculture, stock-breeding and fishing as the three mainstays.
					
					 The tele-education system for everyone has reached a new higher stage and the working out of teaching programs and the writing of new textbooks for the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education system have been rounded off.
					
					 The Chongbong Band has been organized as a unit of dependable art pace-setters along with the Moranbong Band, taking the lead in the development of the Juche arts.
					
					 Sportspersons garnered more than 200 medals including over 80 gold medals at a number of international games this year.
					
					 Women's football team won at the 2015 EAFF East Asia Cup, presenting a proud gift to the 70th anniversaries of liberation of Korea and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises WPK for Steering Cause of Independence, Songun and Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises WPK for Steering Cause of Independence, Songun and Socialism
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The seven-decade long history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the glorious one as it has led the Korean people along the way of independence, Songun and socialism, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an editorial article. 
					 The path of independence, Songun and socialism indicated by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is the most scientific and unique revolutionary one for realizing the dream and ideal of people, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Independence, Songun and socialism are the invariable strategic line consistently maintained by the WPK in the revolution and construction, responsible for the destiny of the popular masses, and a banner of sure victory. 
					
					 The WPK has led the people along the road of independence with the steadfast faith to demonstrate the dignity and might of the Korean nation all over the world by giving play to the righteous and staunch Korean people's spirit of national independence. 
					
					 The WPK organizes and guides all the victories of our people while wisely leading the cause of independence, Songun and socialism, holding aloft the banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 The WPK has victoriously led the cause of independence, Songun and socialism. The master key lies in that it has consolidated the single-minded unity and bolstered up the military power in every way and brought about uninterrupted innovations and progress.
					
					 The WPK has been great in steering the cause of independence, Songun and socialism in that it has put powerful spurs to the revolution and construction by dint of single-minded unity. 
					
					 Depending on the invincible military power, the WPK has reliably protected the sovereignty of the socialist motherland and happiness of its people from the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression and war. 
					
					 The final victory of revolution is sure to be achieved when all the service personnel and people of the DPRK advance straight along the way of independence, Songun and socialism, united close around the WPK Central Committee headed by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. This is their unshakable revolutionary faith.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Chairman of S. Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff of His Anti-DPRK Remarks
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Chairman of S. Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff of His Anti-DPRK Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Ri Sun Jin, who held the post as chairman of the south Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff, at a "National Assembly" confirmation hearing on Oct. 7 blustered that Yonphyong Island shelling incident five years ago was a "provocation made by the north." He uttered that he would make the "north bitterly regret it" and he would become "chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff to be feared by the enemy." He cried out for "striking at the base of provocation when the north launches shelling," while talking such rubbish that the south Korean army is "capable of doing so alone" without approval of the U.S. forces.
					 Minju Joson Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What he uttered is an undisguised provocation to the DPRK as it chills the hard-won atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Yonphyong Island shelling incident was a product of plot, confrontation and war moves orchestrated by the south Korean military warmongers in league with outsiders for aggression.
					
					 As already known to everybody, over one month has passed since an agreement was reached between the north and the south but the south Korean authorities deliberately linked the "mine" which went off for unknown reason with the DPRK and floated the fiction about "provocation from the north in October", laying a stumbling block in the way for mending the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The bellicose remarks made by Ri against this backdrop clearly prove that the "dialogue" and "peaceful unification" touted by the south Korean authorities are no more than a fig-leaf to cover up their true colors as confrontation maniacs and that they remain unchanged in their ambition for achieving "unification of social systems" and "unification through absorption."
					
					 Should the south Korean bellicose forces seek confrontation with the DPRK to the last, it will only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Authorities to Think Twice
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges S. Korean Authorities to Think Twice
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are now crying out for "joint counteraction with international community," talking about "provocation in October" by someone and the "time for forces for unification diplomacy to get re-appreciation."
					 Their hue and cry over "joint counteraction with international community" at the crucial and sensitive time with the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at hand is grave infringement upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and another unpardonable provocation to it. 
					
					 As already reported, the hard-won atmosphere of the north-south reconciliation has been put at serious peril owing to the ever-more reckless confrontation moves of the south Korean authorities in October. 
					
					 A few days ago, the south Korean diplomatic authorities together with the special representative for North Korea policy of the U.S. Department of State vociferated about "reaffirmation of effective cooperation" with the U.S. to cope with "provocation by the north." Meanwhile, authorities of the south Korean ministries of Defense and Unification cried out for "full-scale operation of cooperation system" with the U.S. and trumpeted about "crucial period of cooperation." 
					
					 The 8th KIDD meeting between south Korea and the U.S. agreed to put into concrete shape the "4D Operational Conception" to cope with "north Korea's ballistic missile threat" and develop it into the level of operational plan as part of the "measures for pressure" for coping with "the north's provocation in October." 
					
					 At the same time, the south Korean chief executive is impudently claiming that she would zealously pursue "diplomacy for peaceful unification." 
					
					 She is busy talking she would conduct "diverse discussion with a neighboring country on how to achieve peaceful unification of the Korean Peninsula at an early date and develop security dialogue into multi-party security dialogue for laying a foundation of unification." 
					
					 At a meeting of chief secretaries of Chongwadae on October 5 she uttered "unification should be achieved by the efforts of the south with its own initiative but international community's support and cooperation are very important." She let loose such rhetoric that "she would proactively pursue diplomacy for peaceful unification in the future, too," adding that "through the UN General Assembly she conveyed such message to international community." 
					
					 These facts clearly prove that the south Korean chief executive pursues the aim of intensifying cooperation with outside forces for confrontation with the DPRK on the occasion of the October holiday of the WPK. 
					
					 The more persistently the south Korean authorities peddle story about "provocation in October" and the ridiculous tale about "diplomacy for unification" at home and abroad, while feigning ignorance of their reckless provocations going against the dialogue, peace and improvement of the inter-Korean relations, the more saliently they will reveal their true colors as despicable traitors to the nation keen to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north, clinging to the coattails of outside forces. 
					
					 If they have an elementary reason, they should stop at once dancing to the tune of the U.S. working hard to block the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities would be well advised to think twice at the crossroads of cooperation with the nation or with outside forces.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Marked in China
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Marked in China
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in Shenyang, China on October 6. 
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, and officials of the association and its affiliated units and Korean citizens in Shenyang and the DPRK consul general in Shenyang. 
					
					 Choe Un Bok said in her report the seven-decade long history of the WPK is the one in which it has hewed out the unique way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the banner of the Juche idea. It is the great history in which it set a world example in the socialist construction through the hardest struggle and wrote a heroic epic of the anti-imperialist struggle and the history of victory in which it laid an ever-lasting foundation, she noted, adding:
					
					 All Koreans in China should turn out as one in the patriotic drive for prosperity and reunification of the country true to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, bearing in mind the great honor and pride of living, holding the peerlessly great men in high esteem as the leaders of the nation. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					 The participants watched a video "Meeting for National Reunification to Mark 70th Anniversary of Liberation of Korea".

articles.title: Delegation of Equatorial Guinean Political Party Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Delegation of Equatorial Guinean Political Party Visits DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea visited the DPRK embassy in Malabo on Oct. 2 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK and the 89th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The delegation laid a floral basket and bouquet before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in name of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The head of the delegation handed the congratulatory message sent by the general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea to Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK to the DPRK ambassador to his country.
					
					 Members of the delegation warmly congratulated the 18th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK, the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK and the 89th anniversary of the formation of the DIU.
					
					 They said that it is the firm stand of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea to steadily strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK, wishing the Korean people big successes in their struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the country's independent and peaceful reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegation of Islamic Coalition Party of Iran Visits DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Delegation of Islamic Coalition Party of Iran Visits DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran visited the DPRK embassy in Tehran on Oct. 4 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket before an art work depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and made a bow.
					
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party, extended the highest respect to the President and Kim Jong Il on behalf of all members of his party on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, adding:
					
					 The WPK could have demonstrated its dignity as an invincible party for the past 70 years thanks to the wise leadership of the great leaders.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea, the guiding idea of the Korean revolution, in his early years, and led the WPK along the road of victory and prosperity.
					
					 Kim Jong Il pursued the original Songun politics to frustrate the U.S. aggression moves and defend the sovereignty of the country, making tangible contribution to peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Respected HE Kim Jong Un is steering the struggle for building an economic power, improving people's living standard and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, true to the revolutionary cause of the great leaders.
					
					 We will make every possible effort to boost the friendship and bonds with the WPK, supporting the measures and stands taken by the WPK in the struggle against the U.S. and the north-south relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Hungarian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Hungarian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building" was posted by the Hungarian Workers' Party on its website on Oct. 1.
					 The work published on Oct. 10, Juche 81 (1992) deals with the historic lesson of building the socialist ruling party and fundamental principle of building the revolutionary party of Juche and clarifies the idea of boosting the internationalist unity and solidarity among the revolutionary parties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house in Dhaka City, Bangladesh.
					 The work published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995) serves as a great programme for party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new road of building the revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way of strengthening the party into his eternal party.
					
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Oct. 4.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Romania
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Romania
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- A seminar on Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was held by the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Sept. 28 under the sponsorship of the Romanian preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A briefing on the work was followed by speeches.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, published the work on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung. He went on:
					
					 The work comprehensively deals with the great personality of Kim Il Sung who performed undying feats in the history of the WPK and the devoted efforts of leader Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, who dedicated his all to the strengthening of the party.
					
					 It also reflects the firm faith and will of Kim Jong Un to carry forward the cause of the preceding great leaders.
					
					 Herein lies the significance of the work.
					
					 The Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea expressed belief that the WPK greeting its 70th founding anniversary will more powerfully demonstrate its might as the invincible and steel-strong party playing a leading role in accomplishing the cause of global socialism.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated by Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held by the People's Party of Cambodia and the Bangladesh People's League and lectures and photo exhibition by the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola and the Hungarian Workers' Party on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Sept. 28 and Oct. 2.
					 Displayed at the photo exhibition were photos documenting the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in building and leading the party.
					
					 Yos Son, chairman of the External Relations Commission of the People's Party of Cambodia, said that the relations between Cambodia and the DPRK are the traditional and special friendly ones based on the particular fraternal relations between Norodom Sihanouk, the great king of Cambodia, and President Kim Il Sung and confirmed that the relations between the People's Party of Cambodia and the Workers' Party of Korea would as ever favorably develop in future.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said that the WPK is the invincible and steel-strong party leading the Korean revolution to victory and glory, regarding Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its unique guidelines.
					
					 The international secretary of the Youth Organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola stressed that Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il on the highest level without an inch of deflection.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, October 9 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups and articles to the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Lao newspaper Congtap Pasason Lao on Oct. 2 edited an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il and WPK" illustrated with the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that he strengthened the WPK into the party which achieved a harmonious whole with the popular masses and serves them, fully responsible for their destiny and a powerful political force successfully leading the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 The Ethiopian newspaper Reporter on Oct. 3 carried an article titled "Rosy future of DPRK".
					
					 It stressed that the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation will surely triumph and the future of the DPRK is immensely bright and rosy as they hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the First Secretary of the WPK.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Industry on Sept. 29 in an article titled "Leading the people for 70 years" said that during past 70 years since its founding the WPK has won only brilliant victories while wisely leading the whole army and people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, recibio el dia 9 un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China, Xi Jinping.
					 La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					 Con motivo del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, envio calurosas felicitaciones en representacion del CC del PCCh y en nombre mio a Usted y, por su conducto, al CC del PTC, a todos los militantes del PTC y al pueblo coreano.
					
					 Bajo la direccion de los grandes Lideres del pueblo coreano, Presidente Kim Il Sung y Secretario General Kim Jong Il, el PTC logro la independencia del pais y la liberacion del pueblo superando las multiples dificultades al conducir al pueblo coreano y alcanzo en la causa de la revolucion y construccion socialistas de Corea los exitos que merecen la atencion.
					
					 En los ultimos anos, el Primer Secretario Kim Jong Un logro el avance activo en el desarrollo economico, la mejora de la vida del pueblo y otras ramas dirigiendo al PTC y al pueblo coreano en acato a los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Secretario General Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Deseo de todo corazon que bajo la direccion del PTC encabezado por el Primer Secretario Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logre incesantemente nuevos y mayores exitos en la causa de construccion del socialismo al estilo coreano.
					
					  La amistad China-Corea tiene las tradiciones gloriosas.
					
					  Tenemos la voluntad de desempenar el papel activo y constructivo para ofrecer la felicidad a los dos paises y los dos pueblos y defender la paz y la estabilidad de la region y el resto del mundo, al mantener, consolidar y desarrollar excelentemente la amistad China-Corea haciendo esfuerzos junto con los camaradas coreanos.
					
					  Formulo sinceros votos por que el PTC se desarrolle continuamente y la RPDC se prospere y la amistad China-Corea se transmita de generacion en generacion.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion del PCCh
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion del PCCh
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 9 a esta capital la delegacion del Partido Comunista de China encabezada por Liu Yunshan, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC y miembro del Secretariado del PCCh para participar en los actos por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC y realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PCCh
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de PTC y PCCh
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar este viernes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Partido Comunista de China. 
					Participaron, por la parte coreana, Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del PTC, el subjefe de departamento Ri Chang Gun y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC, y por la china, los miembros de la delegacion del PCCh encabezada por Liu Yunshan, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico y miembro del Secretariado del Comite Central del PCCh, y el embajador en la RPDC, Li Chenqun.
					
					Ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los asuntos de interes mutuo.

articles.title: CC de PTC ofrece banquete en honor de delegacion de PCCh
articles.content:
CC de PTC ofrece banquete en honor de delegacion de PCCh
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea ofrecio el dia 9 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae un banquete en honor de la delegacion del Partido Comunista de China, que realiza una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al convite fueron invitados los miembros de la delegacion del PCCh, encabezada por Liu Yunshan, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico y miembro del Secretariado del Comite Central del PCCh, y el embajador Li Chenqun y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Chang Gun, el vicecanciller Ri Kil Song y otros funcionarios de rama interesada.
					
					En el discurso, Choe Ryong Hae menciono que el pueblo coreano celebra grandiosamente el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC como una fiesta revolucionaria en medio de gran orgullo y jubilo.
					
					Continuo que durante su permanencia, la delegacion del PCCh presenciara directamente el espiritu y la realidad vivida de Corea que avanza vigorosamente con la confianza y la esperanza en la victoria, uniendose monoliticamente en torno al gran Partido. 
					
					A su vez, Liu Yunshan dijo que bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el PTC logro los exitos asombrosos en la revolucion y la construccion del socialismo con el poderio de la unidad monolitica.
					
					El PTC, con la gloriosa historia y tradicion, es el nucleo directivo de la revolucion coreana y la construccion, senalo y formulo votos de todo corazon por exitos del pueblo coreano en la construccion del socialismo a estilo coreano bajo la orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Llega delegacion de Partido Comunista de Vietnam
articles.content:
Llega delegacion de Partido Comunista de Vietnam 
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido Comunista de Vietnam encabezada por Ha Thi Khiet, secretario y jefe del Departamento de Movimiento Masivo del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, llego este viernes a esta capital para tomar parte en las actividades festivas por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones del PTC y del PCV
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones del PTC y del PCV
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 9 en esta capital las conversaciones entre las delegaciones del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Partido Comunista de Vietnam. 
					Participaron, por la parte coreana, el secretario Choe Thae Bok, el subjefe de departamento Pak Kun Gwang y otros funcionarios, del CC del PTC, y por la vietnamita, los miembros de la delegacion del PCV presidida por Ha Thi Khiet, secretario y jefe del Departamento de Movimiento Masivo del CC del PCV y Pham Viet Hung, embajador en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					En las conversaciones acordaron desarrollar mas las relaciones entre los dos partidos y debatieron los problemas de interes mutuo.
					
					El mismo dia, quedo rubricado el acuerdo sobre la cooperacion entre el Departamento Internacional del CC del PTC y el Departamento de Relaciones Exteriores del CC del PCV.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de partido y gobierno de Cuba
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de partido y gobierno de Cuba
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Llego el dia 9 a esta capital la delegacion de partido y gobierno de la Republica de Cuba encabezada por Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba, para tomar parte en los actos festivos por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre Yang Hyong Sop y Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre Yang Hyong Sop y Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa
Pyongyang, 9 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 9 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre Yang Hyong Sop, miembro del Buro Politico del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y Salvador Antonio Valdes Mesa, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y vicepresidente del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba. 
					Participaron, por la parte coreana, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Chol y el vicecanciller Sin Hong Chol, y por la cubana, los miembros de la delegacion del partido y el gobierno Cuba, de visita en la RPDC.
					
					En las conversaciones fueron debatidos los problemas para desarrollar mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises.
